name: SAMSUNG Galaxy Z Fold4 5G (12GB RAM, 256GB, Beige)

prod_desc.heading: Why buy Samsung Galaxy Z Fold4 5G
features: Dolby Atmos your large-screen experience with the immersive stereo speakers
Triple Rear camera the world in your photos becomes more vibrant and dynamic
IPX8 Water Resistant no need to worry about rain or shine when you've got one of the world's first water-resistant foldable smartphones
sub_features: The new immersive AMOLED 2X display comes with the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold4 5G fold mobile. The  (7.6') display becomes your ultimate do-more tool thanks to the Main Screen. Additionally, you may keep it there while working on other things like setting it down, finding a decent angle, and going hands-free. You can now fully enter the zone. On a stunning 7.6-inch Infinity Flex Display with pushed-back bezels and an even better hidden Under Display Camera, there is more screen and no black dot to interfere in the way of your favorite games. On a display that climbs up to 120Hz, navigating through games or the newsfeed is as fluid as possible. This responsive screen is so refreshing that it even changes the refresh rate to give you the best possible view.

Send big files like videos and high-resolution photos with the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold4 5G to your friends before the night is over. Great portraits may be created at any time. The Galaxy Z Fold4's rear cameras make use of cutting-edge hardware and software that combine to increase the amount of light in low-light images. A sophisticated processor intelligently boosts the color and clarity of every photo from twilight today and beyond. Even quick snaps taken with the 50MP Wide-angle Camera are high-resolution works of art. With Detail Enhancer, you can improve depth and sharpness while removing blur from your photos. Go ahead and book the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold4 5G online, now!

similar_products.name: Samsung Galaxy S23 Plus 5G (8GB RAM, 256GB, Cream)

faqs.que: What is unique about Samsung phones?
faqs.ans: Galaxy devices leverage crisp, expansive screens to give users a variety of options for working across multiple apps. Samsung smartphones have featured Multi Window mode as far back as 2012's Galaxy Note II, and each subsequent generation has further refined the multitasking experience

faqs.que: Why are Samsung phones better than other brands?
faqs.ans: Samsung has the most expansive customer support and repair service network among all other Android OEMs. It also offers some of the best trade-in values in the mobile industry, allowing many of us to upgrade to newer devices more often than we would if choosing a different brand

faqs.que: Can I upgrade any Samsung Mobile Device?
faqs.ans: No. You must purchase an eligible Samsung smartphone device and opt-in to the Samsung Upgrade Program at checkout using an approved Samsung Financing Account.

faqs.que: How many years can a Samsung last?
faqs.ans: The lifetime of smartphones like Samsung and iPhone is much longer than smaller brands. Here is a breakdown of the average mobile life according to the different brands: iPhone - four to eight years. Samsung - three to six years.
